title: Tasty Mediterranean Grilled Chicken Recipe
content:
Finger licking grilled chicken with Mediterranean flavors. The lemon juice, oregano adds a nice taste to the chicken.

The chicken is so flavourful and tastes so juicy. The chicken outside has a nice crust in them from the charcoal and the inside is so juicy. This tastes amazing with some mayonnaise or garlic sauce.

 

Mediterranean Grilled Chicken Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 40 mins

Total time: 50 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Italian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken - 1 whole chicken cut into segments

Onion - 1 large pureed

Red Chilli Flakes - 2 tablespoons

Oregano - 2 teaspoon

Black Pepper Powder - 2 teaspoon

Honey - 3 to 4 tablespoons

Salt to taste

Lemon Juice - 4 tablespoons

Olive Oil - 4 tablespoons

 

Instructions

Take all ingredients in a bowl and mix well. Add in chicken and leave to marinate overnight.

The next day, cook it in a charcoal barbeque grill.

You can cook in regular over as well. Preheat oven to 200 degrees C. Bake for 35 to 40 mins. Remove and broil for 2 to 3 mins.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Baked Ranch Chicken Recipe
recommendations.content:
Baked Ranch Chicken Recipe with step wise pictures. Delicious ranch baked chicken which tastes so delicious and is so juicy. The chicken makes a great snack.
I recently tried this and I was kind of addicted to it because it turned out to be very delicious. It was spicy and juicy and smoky

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Caesar Salad Recipe
recommendations.content:
Chicken caesar salad tossed with creamy garlic and parmesan flavored creamy dressing topped with a poached egg.
I hope you will give this a try and let me know how it turns out for you.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
